name: Stalker (itch) (Katelyst)
description:
A Point-and-click Horror adventure.

The game takes place in the life of Mina, who lives in a small home in Bredon. While living her life and working at the post office, mysterious notes and packages are addressed to her home and nearby addresses. While trying to find out where they come from, life starts to get a little uncomfortable, and everyone seems suspicious. Who is the one doing this? And what for?

This is the first prototype of Stalker, a work-in-progress game by Katelyst.

We aim to develop games with players, please leave any comments, ideas, or feedback in the comment section!
